column2: BRIEF-Snap-On Says Planned 2020 In-Person Annual Meeting Of Shareholders Moved To Virtual Meeting April 6 (Reuters) - Snap-On Inc: * SNAP-ON - WILL MOVE IN 2020 FROM ORIGINALLY PLANNED IN-PERSON ANNUAL MEETING OF SHAREHOLDERS AT CO’S HEADQUARTERS TO VIRTUAL MEETING Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Snap Says Stuart Bowers Will Be Leaving Co To Join Tesla May 22 (Reuters) - Snap Inc: * SNAP INC SAYS STUART BOWERS WILL BE LEAVING SNAP ON FRIDAY, MAY 25, TO JOIN TESLA AS A LEADER ON THEIR AUTOPILOT ENGINEERING TEAM * SNAP INC SAYS NIMA KHAJEHNOURI WILL SERVE AS ACTING LEAD FOR CO’S MONETIZATION ENGINEERING DEPARTMENT Further company coverage:
BRIEF-Snap-On Sets Quarterly Dividend Of $0.82 Per Share April 26 (Reuters) - Snap-On Inc: * SETS QUARTERLY DIVIDEND OF $0.82PER SHARE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Snap-On Announces Q1 Earnings Per Share $2.82 April 19 (Reuters) - Snap-On Inc: * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $2.72 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * Q1 SALES $935.5 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $926.8 MILLION * EXPECTS CAPITAL EXPENDITURES IN 2018 WILL BE IN A RANGE OF $90 MILLION TO $100 MILLION, OF WHICH $18.0 MILLION WAS INCURRED IN Q1 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
